name: Rooklike
description:
Rooklike

This game was created for TechnicallyAJam. The theme was "Like X but Y" with X an existing concept/game and Y a twist. The twist could be gameplay or visual wise.

We choosed Like Chess but Hitman. For that we have the Chess pieces and their movement that can freely move in a world with more details than a simple chess. You will have to kill the king or everyone. But watch out! If they see you, they will chase you and kill you.
